CustomField.formula: IF( Seasonality__c = "Low" , PAF_Packagee__r.Low_Season_Base_Fare__c , IF( Seasonality__c = "Shoulder" , PAF_Packagee__r.Shoulder_Season_Base_Fare__c , IF( Seasonality__c = "High" , PAF_Packagee__r.High_Season_Base_Fare__c , IF( Seasonality__c = "Sale" , PAF_Packagee__r.Sale_Season_Base_Fare__c , PAF_Packagee__r.High_Season_Base_Fare__c ))))
CustomField.label: Base Fare
